title: Enhancing E-Learning Practical Competencies: Emotional Inquiry Workshops for the Diagnostic Phase of Management Development Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level understanding of organizational diagnostics and management development
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners derive at least three core strengths and improvement areas of an organization using affective inquiry (AI) methodologies
Learners clearly define five development needs aligned with organizational strategy through cross-departmental collaboration
Learners create team-level action plans based on AI workshop outcomes and propose at least one implementable task
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
